title: ValueError: Specs passed to a DirectoryLayout must be concrete
body:
I received this error while trying to view a package:

```
$ spack view -d true hardlink "../cosmomc" cosmomc
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/xfs1/applications/spack/spack/bin/spack", line 220, in <module>
    main(sys.argv)
  File "/xfs1/applications/spack/spack/bin/spack", line 216, in main
    _main(args, unknown)
  File "/xfs1/applications/spack/spack/bin/spack", line 183, in _main
    return_val = command(parser, args)
  File "/xfs1/applications/spack/spack/lib/spack/spack/cmd/view.py", line 303, in view
    visitor(specs, args)
  File "/xfs1/applications/spack/spack/lib/spack/spack/cmd/view.py", line 262, in visitor_hardlink
    link_one(spec, path, os.link, verbose=args.verbose)
  File "/xfs1/applications/spack/spack/lib/spack/spack/cmd/view.py", line 227, in link_one
    for dirpath, dirnames, filenames in os.walk(spec.prefix):
  File "/xfs1/applications/spack/spack/lib/spack/spack/spec.py", line 1308, in prefix
    return Prefix(spack.store.layout.path_for_spec(self))
  File "/xfs1/applications/spack/spack/lib/spack/spack/directory_layout.py", line 124, in path_for_spec
    _check_concrete(spec)
  File "/xfs1/applications/spack/spack/lib/spack/spack/directory_layout.py", line 42, in _check_concrete
    raise ValueError('Specs passed to a DirectoryLayout must be concrete!')
ValueError: Specs passed to a DirectoryLayout must be concrete!
```

There is only a single package matching this spec:
```
$ spack find -l cosmomc
==> 1 installed packages.
-- linux-ubuntu14-x86_64 / gcc@6.2.0 ----------------------------
k56w7ep cosmomc@2016.11
```

Is there a work-around?
